alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pittsburg; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 7:52AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of northwestern Pushmataha, western Latimer and Pittsburg Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 748 AM CDT, Surface observations and public reports indicate strong winds in the wake of thunderstorm activity across southeast Oklahoma. These winds will spread southeast across southern Pittsburg county. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotter. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Wilburton... Clayton... Hartshorne... Krebs... Kiowa... Savanna... Alderson... Ashland... Higgins... Haywood... Tuskahoma... Stanley... Clayton Lake State Park... Damon... Yanush... Robbers Cave State Park... Mcalester Regional Airport... Dunbar... Blanco... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma.
